name: Illumination (Cadin Batrack)
description:
Illumination an interactive mini-comic for Playdate. 

Set in the universe of The Botanist, this quick sci-fi adventure sees him using his knowledge of the plant kingdom to try to remedy a lighting failure at his scientific outpost. 

This mini-comic demonstrates the experience one can expect in The Botanist and other comics built with the Panels framework.

This is a linear story with a total play time of just 2-3 minutes.

Installation Instructions

Download the PDX here and side load it on to your Playdate. 
Please refer to Sideloading Playdate games on the Playdate help site

Development

Story, art & code by Cadin Batrack.
Built with Panels.

Follow development updates on Cadin's Dev Blog.
View the full source code on GitHub.
